What If_

You never had to stop for gas again?

Back

World Without Petrol

To launch the Nissan LEAF in Australia, we imagined a world full of electric cars with an interactive outdoor exhibition. Australian artist, James Dive, recycled petrol bowsers into functioning pieces of art. A fish tank, an amplifier, a Pac-Man game, a coffee machine, a giant water fountain and more gave people a reason to stop…and imagine a world without petrol.

  •

    A World Without Petrol Transformation

    See the "A World Without Petrol" interactive art installation come to life.

  •

    A World without Petrol Amplifier

    Watch the crowd-pleasing reaction of a petrol bowser recycled into an amplifier.

  •

    A World without Petrol Pac-Man

    Discover how a petrol bowser recycled into a Pac-Man game is hard to resist.
